nodes.text: Butter was a substance used in cooking which could be made from milk, including bantha butter made from the one produced by banthas, or from nuts to make nut butter. Westhills butter was a type of butter made in the Westhills of the planet Lothal. While at the Academy for Young Imperials on Lothal, cadet Jai Kell wished for some Westhills butter with maize rolls instead of the ration-squares the academy served. Nerf butter was another kind.
